summary: Utility module that offers a collection of helper functions for managing NeMo model configurations, checkpoints, and artifacts. It includes logic for converting and loading configuration files, handling version compatibility, importing classes by dotted paths, resolving dataset identifiers, injecting and removing model‑parallel rank information, and determining artifact locations inside or outside archives.
business_intent: Streamline the lifecycle of NeMo models—loading, saving, versioning, and preparing data—so developers can reliably deploy and train models without dealing with low‑level file handling or compatibility issues.
